alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 3:45AM EST until January 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts possible on the South Fork of Long Island. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
